items.summary: Switch the UI typography to a classic (non-cursive) font across the app by removing usage of the `font-cursive` styling on headings (proposal screen and celebration screen) and the letter modal title, and ensure all visible text renders in a standard non-cursive font style.
Remove the proposal-screen line of text "I have something special to ask you... ðŸ’•" so it is no longer displayed anywhere in the question state UI.

Remove all meme content from the celebration screen, including the couple-cats meme image and any visible "MWAAHH/MWAAHHH" meme text, so the celebration state contains no meme image and no "MWAAHH" line.
